channel.title: A message to niall
channel.description:
Niall,
Out off all the forum moderates and admin.... i dislike you the most. you choose to lock topics just because You find the question "stupid" or you think the persons stupid. It's not your choice what we can post as long as we abide to the rules. So why the heck do you lock so many posts when they break no rules?

item.title: A message to niall
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

alexplt178:

Out off all the forum moderates and admin… i dislike you the most.

Oh well.

[quote=“alexplt178, post:6, topic:202298”][quote author=Evan` link=topic=267011.msg2205185#msg2205185 date=1209184864]
He’s not the one that thought quake was coded in java.
[/quote]

why does every 1 think i think quake is codded in java.[/quote]

And I said I did?

Your post was ridiculously hard to understand, and only after reviewing it I understand that you want to compile/run Quake 3 open source.

Honestly, how can you expect to learn from a complex project such as Quake 3, when you cannot use google? It took 5 seconds of my time on google to find this. “VC7 / Visual C++ 2003 project files are provided:”, “To compile the qvms, you need to run some batch files:” and “the qvm batch files are in code/game code/cgame code/q3_ui code/ui …” can all be found in it.

The main reason I locked it, is that it was ridiculously hard to understand like I just said, and we’re not going to be spoon feeding you, I thought the latter was pretty obvious in my other post.

Read full topic

item.title: A message to niall
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Wow, I wanted to be most hated by faggots. GG Niall, you are my idol.

Read full topic

item.title: A message to niall
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

All forum staff moderate the forums at their own discretion, as those selected to moderate/administrate the forum are deemed capable of doing so.
Complaining like this, in public, is unacceptable - when you do have a legitimate complaint (and this one is far from legitimate), you should send a PM to a moderator or an administrator.

As far as locking questions go, I can explain that one in just a few words: Use the search feature, and you’ll find the same question asked on countless occasions. Duplicates are unnecessary.

Read full topic
